trans-unit.source: Specifies that an object can be initialized by using a non-default constructor syntax, and that a property of the specified name supplies construction information.
trans-unit.target: 指定可使用非預設建構函式語法而初始化的物件，以及所指定名稱的屬性可提供建構資訊。

trans-unit.source: This information is primarily for XAML serialization.
trans-unit.target: 這項資訊主要供 XAML 序列化之用。

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies that the associated property can be initialized by a constructor parameter and should be ignored for XAML serialization if the constructor is used to construct the instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指定可以由建構函式參數初始化相關聯的屬性，並要忽略的 XAML 序列化建構函式用來建構執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This provides better round trip representations for parameterized constructor syntax rather than default constructor instantiation plus specific attributes.
trans-unit.target: 這提供更好的來回行程表示參數化建構函式語法，而非預設建構函式具現化加上特定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A framework can potentially support preserving markup extension usages and reconstituting them rather than relying on `ProvideValue` output in the object tree for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Framework 可以可能支援保留標記延伸使用方式和 reconstituting 它們，而非依賴`ProvideValue`輸出中序列化的物件樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ConstructorArgumentAttribute> information is useful during serialization for producing an accurate representation of the typical markup extension usage.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ConstructorArgumentAttribute>資訊，以便產生一般的標記延伸使用方式的精確表示序列化期間會很有用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about markup extensions, see [Markup Extensions for XAML Overview](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需標記延伸的詳細資訊，請參閱[標記延伸 XAML 概觀](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: In order to be valid for a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ConstructorArgumentAttribute> attribution, a type's public non-default constructor must support exactly one parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要有效<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ConstructorArgumentAttribute>類型的公用屬性，非預設建構函式必須支援只有一個參數。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter must correspond to a read/write property.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱必須對應到讀取/寫入屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property must be otherwise serializable.
trans-unit.target: 屬性否則必須為可序列化。

trans-unit.source: You use this attribute to create the correspondence between the name of the parameter in the constructor, and the property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來建立於建構函式，參數名稱與屬性之間的對應關係。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, you apply this attribute to the property-level definition of the connecting read/write property.
trans-unit.target: 具體而言，將這個屬性套用至連線的讀/寫屬性的屬性層級定義。

trans-unit.source: Consumers of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ConstructorArgumentAttribute> may throw in cases where <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ConstructorArgumentAttribute.ArgumentName%2A> does not resolve to type backing, or when applied to a type that does not have the appropriate construction arguments and arity.
trans-unit.target: 取用者<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ConstructorArgumentAttribute>可能情況下會擲回其中<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ConstructorArgumentAttribute.ArgumentName%2A>未解析為類型備份，或是套用至沒有適當的建構引數和引數數目的型別時。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ConstructorArgumentAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ConstructorArgumentAttribute>位於 System.Xaml 組件中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: WPF Usage Notes
trans-unit.target: WPF 使用注意事項

trans-unit.source: For more information about markup extensions and WPF, see [Markup Extensions and WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需標記延伸和 WPF 的詳細資訊，請參閱[標記延伸和 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the constructor that will initialize the associated property.
trans-unit.target: 將初始化相關聯屬性的建構函式名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ConstructorArgumentAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ConstructorArgumentAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name parameter of the constructor that will initialize the associated property.
trans-unit.target: 取得將初始化相關聯屬性的建構函式名稱參數。

trans-unit.source: The name of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式名稱

trans-unit.source: Assuming CLR backing, this corresponds to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo.Name" /> of the relevant constructor parameter.
trans-unit.target: 假設 CLR 支援，這會對應到相關建構函式參數的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo.Name" />。
